description.en: The role of angels is to evaluate the good deeds performed by humans and grant them "small wishes" in return. Ariel is one of these angels. However, what appeared in front of her was a high school girl who didn't have a "small wish" despite having performed over 10,000 good deeds. Ariel tries to approach this high school girl, and then… Angel (♀) × JK (♀) a somewhat naughtly slapstick romantic comedy ♡
description.ja:
天使たちの役目は、人間の善行を評価し、その善行にあった「小さな願い」を叶えること。天使・アリエルもその役目を担う一人であった。しかし、目の前に現れたのは、数万もの善行を重ねているにも関わらず「小さな願い」のひとつも見えない女子高生で？

接触を試みるアリエルに、迫るＪＫ……
「わたしと、シてみる？」――――――――!?!?

description.en: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space
100 Short Manga about Types of and Behavior in Yuri Relationships

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind. When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」

日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.vi: Thời hiện đại trong câu chuyện này là thời đại của "đa dạng" giống loài, những chủng tộc bán nhân có một tên gọi mới là"Genjin" và sống cùng nền văn minh con người. Yukata Shinsou, 1 học sinh năm nhất cao trung bình thường quyết dịnh nhập học vào một ngôi trường tư thục có tỉ lệ Genjin cao nhất nước để tránh mặt những người bạn sơ trung của mình. Và rồi cậu gặp được Tsumiki Ogami, một cô nàng Genjin dạng người sói, và cô ấy sẽ dẫn cậu tận hưởng cuộc sống cao trung đầy màu sắc!
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

altTitles.en: Princess Who Hides Her Fandom

altTitles.es-la: Una princesa que trabaja duro por su favorito

altTitles.en: The Princess is Secretly a Fan
The Incognito Princess

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a novel with my living and breathing bias.
Now I’m an Imperial Princess, who is known by all sorts of epithets, Agnes Saint!

It’s great that she’s filthy rich and a royal and all, but there’s just one problem…
the hateful trash who just insulted by bias’s very existence is none other than ‘me.’

Regardless, I’m here now and…
I will do anything, and everything, within my power to prevent my bias’s death and ensure he experiences nothing but smooth sailing going forward!

I would never wish for Kylo, my kitten, to suffer any sort of shock.
That’s why I have to hide my fervent adoration.
Besides, nothing good would come from revealing my stanning anyways.
So, for the time being, I’ll be perfect at… 

‘stanning in secret.’

Other World Pharmacy
Pharmacy in Another World

altTitles.th: เภสัชกรเทพสองโลก

description.en:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
description.pt-br: Um jovem farmacêutico e pesquisador no Japão morreu de trabalho excessivo e foi reencarnado em uma Europa Paralela Medieval. Ele foi reencarnado como um aprendiz de 10 anos para um famoso farmacêutico da Royal Court, tinha alcançado habilidades desumanas de habilidade para ver a doença, a criação material e a destruição material. Em uma sociedade em que a prática médica duvidosa é desenfreada, o aumento dos preços através do monopólio da aliança farmacêutica e uma boa medicina não estão disponíveis para os plebeus. Ele foi reconhecido pelo imperador naquele momento e abriu uma farmácia na esquina da cidade. Ele eliminará a fraude que varreu o mundo e entregará aos plebeus um medicamento verdadeiramente eficaz que foi desenvolvido usando a farmacologia atual. Assim, o menino farmacêutico enganará usando seu conhecimento prévio para criar medicamentos inovadores, ajudando as pessoas do mundo paralelo, uma história sobre como viver sua nova vida ao máximo desta vez. A popular web novel agora vem em forma de manga!

description.en:
A tranquil tale about two boys from very different upbringings. On one hand, you have Kai, born as the son of a prostitute, who's been playing the abandoned piano in the forest near his home ever since he was young. And on the other you have Syuhei, practically breast-fed by the piano as the son of a family of prestigious pianists. Yet it is their common bond with the piano that eventually intertwines their paths in life.  
  
---
- **Won the 12th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize in 2008**

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!

description.en:
I've always loved you. That's why whether in sickness or in heath, I want to walk beside you...

I went to Hanafuu University, a different school than my best friend, Aiko. I'm sad to be separated from Aiko, but I thought I would be fine if I can be with my lover, Ritsu... but he's been busy with the opening of his second store, and we can hardly meet. I don't want to bother him, so I pretend to be mature and behave myself, but it seems like I've made a mistake...?!

Xia Yuxin's presence at school never fails to draw attention. She has a mature beauty about her, always poised, and exuding confidence in class. Being admired so much by her classmates, one would think she's a well-respected senior but in truth, it might be because she's a repeat student. Xia Yuxin has more to her elegant facade.


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative official English](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/Lala/5c0a4df8d5626e75ff1f2d11)
description.pt-br:
Xia Yu Xun é uma estudante que por ter faltado em uma prova, teve que repetir um ano. Para todos os seus colegas de classe que são um ano menor que ela, Xia Yu Xun é uma Xue Jie (senpai, veterana) genial, alta, decidida, muito bela e muito “cool”. Claro que ela não pensa assim, adoraria ser mais baixa pois assim conseguiria usar roupas mais bonitas. Sua obsessão é tanta que desenha suas próprias criações, com intenção de algum dia surgir alguém com o “estilo” dos seus sonhos. Na escola acaba encontrando uma pessoa adequada para isso, mas fazer amizade com ela vai ser um pouco difícil…


---

description.en: "Magic." A sacred mystery usable only by those chosen. One day, a child from the slums named Arus finds he has the power to use magic. A sorcerer by the name of Genos Willzard learns of his talent and raises him, turning him into the greatest of assassins. One day, Genos gives him an order: To enroll at the Magic Academy...?!
description.id: Sihir, misteri yang hanya bisa digunakan oleh orang-orang terpilih. Suatu hari, seorang anak yang berasal dari desa kumuh bernama Ars, menyadari bahwa dirinya memiliki kekuatan sihir. Seorang penyihir bernama Genos Wilzard menemukan bakatnya itu, lalu membesarkannya untuk menjadikannya sebagai pembunuh terkuat. Bagaimana ya kisahnya ketika Genos menyuruhnya masuk ke Akademi Sihir…!?
description.ja: 貴族に生まれた者のみが使える神秘、魔法――。貧しい出自で虐げられた生活を余儀なくされる幼き少年・アルスだったが、ある日、自分に魔法の才の宿る『呪われた血』であることに気がつく。暗殺者に拾われ、裏社会の魔法師として鍛錬を積んだアルスは15歳になる年に『王立魔法学園』入学を勧められることに…。
description.vi:
Áp đảo giới quý tộc, pháp sư mạnh nhất từ ​​khu ổ chuột !!
Ars vốn là một thằng ăn cắp vặt trong khu ổ chuột. Và được nhận nuôi để trở thành sát thủ. Ở tuổi 15, Ars được khuyên nên đi học để đủ tiêu chuẩn trở thành "Pháp sư". Vừa bước vào cổng trường, là sự xuất hiện của những quý tộc có trình độ không bằng một cái móng tay của Ars, người đã vượt qua kỳ kiểm tra đầu vào với khả năng vượt trội, bắt đầu một cuộc sống khác thường. Là học sinh vào ban ngày và một sát thủ vào ban đêm!!

title.en: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.ja: 与えられたスキルを使って稼いで異世界美女達とイチャイチャしたい（コミック）

altTitles.ja-ro: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.en: I Want to Use the Skills Given to Earn Money and Flirt With Beauties From Other World

altTitles.id: Aku Ingin Menggunakan Keterampilan Yang Diberikan Untuk Mendapatkan Uang Dan Menggoda Wanita Cantik Dari Dunia Lain

altTitles.pt-br: Quero usar as habilidade que me foi dado para ganhar dinheiro e flertar com lindas mulheres de outro mundo.

description.en: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.
description.pt-br: Naquele dia, Ishida Yamada estava trabalhando meio período, como sempre. Ao abrir a porta dos fundos após terminar seu trabalho de meio período, ele encontrou um espaço em branco e uma pessoa que se autodenominava Deus. Foi por acaso que ele foi escolhido por Deus para ir para outro mundo. Ele ficou perplexo, mas decidiu viver mesmo assim. Pensando em como sobreviver neste outro mundo usando as habilidades que recebeu de Deus, ele tenta ao máximo ter um relacionamento físico com uma linda mulher neste outro mundo.

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

altTitles.vi: Destiny Unchain Online: Bị biến thành thiếu nữ ma cà rồng, tôi được biết đến với tên gọi "Xích Sắc Ma Vương"

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Mitsuki Kou é um jogador PVP tão temido que ganhou o apelido de "Crim, o Caçador de Cabeças" em alguns círculos. Seu próximo jogo para dominar? "Destiny Unchain Online", um novo jogo VRMMO desenvolvido por ninguém menos que o pai de Kou. Mas, nenhum jogo novo no dia do lançamento está livre de bugs - ou seja, Kou sofre um glitch para o meio do nada, e seu avatar de vampiro é transformado em uma garota! Uma história para todos que através dos jogos fizeram novos amigos e miraram no topo... comece!

description.en: To repair the singularity of the future, the main character, Ritsuka Fujimaru, will shift again to lay down a tremendous battle.
description.pt-br: Ao lidar com a incineração da ordem humana, Fujimaru Ritsuka se depara com uma nova e incompreensiva ameaça. Tudo começa quando um navio petroleiro denominado Seraphix desaparece sem deixar rastros.

altTitles.ja: 雪解けとアガパンサス

altTitles.en: Snow Thaw & Love Letter

description.en: Natsuki, the prince of an all-girls school meets an innocent (girl) transfer student, Shun, who doesn't treat Natsuki like a prince, but instead treats her as a "friend." Natsuki excels in everything she does and even has a fan club at school. Even though she was looked at with admiration, her days were somehow unfulfilled... Although Natsuki feels uncomfortable with her first "friend", Shun's innocent smile and bright personality make Natsuki's heart flutter...?
description.ja: 文武両道でファンクラブまで存在する女子校の王子(プリンス)、夏月(なつき)。憧憬の眼差しを受けながらも、何だか満たされない日々を送っていた……。そんな彼女のもとに、転校生の春(しゅん)がやって来る。今までの生徒たちとは違い、夏月を王子様扱いせず、「友達」として接する春。夏月は初めての「友達」に違和感を抱きながらも、その無邪気な笑顔と明るい性格に心がときめいていき…？

altTitles.ja: 彼岸島48日後…

description.en: The human army lost the battle against the vampires on Higanjima Island. Unable to prevent Miyabi's plan, Japan has become a vampire country. Six months later, there is a one-armed man fighting the vampires in abandoned Japan! The man's name is Akira Miyamoto. A warrior who has already tasted hell on Higanjima.

description.en:
"Every person is the protagonist of his or her own life. But how many of us can truly live. How many of us can truly be the hero of our own lives?" Youth Protagonist.

This is a love story about a high school boy who thinks he is incapable of love for one reason or another, and a girl classmate who falls in love with him.
description.pt-br:
“Cada pessoa é protagonista de sua própria vida. Mas quantos de nós podem viver verdadeiramente? Quantos de nós podem ser verdadeiramente o herói de nossas próprias vidas?” Protagonista Juvenil.

Esta é uma história de amor sobre um estudante do ensino médio que acredita ser incapaz de amar por uma razão ou outra, e uma colega de classe que se apaixona por ele.

altTitles.en: Legend of Aobing

description.en:
Based on the 2019 movie "Nezha"  
  
Over a thousand years, spiritual energy of the earth and heavens merged to form a Chaos Pearl. Yuanshi Tianzun refined it into a Demon Pill and a Spirit Pearl.  
  
The Spirit Pearl, which was supposed to be reincarnated into Nezha's body, was stolen by Shen Gongbao and given to the East Dragon King. As such, the Third Prince Aobing, the reincarnation of the Spirit Pearl, was born. Surrounding Aobing is a series of events about growth, and a battle against the Dragons that is beginning.

altTitles.en: The Chick-Class Hunter is Filial!

description.en: In a world where special powers awaken in individuals, a 4-year-old boy becomes an S-class hunter but has no parents. Assigned a quest to find guardians, he is eventually adopted by the nation’s top hunter. With a new skill that allows him to register caregivers and earn "devotion points" for growth, he sets out to gather the best guardians to grow stronger and thrive.

title.en: Power-Hara Genkai Yuusha, Maougun kara Koutaiguu de Scout sareru ~Yuusha Ranking 1-i na no ni Tedori ga Gomi sugite Seikatsu Dekimasen~

altTitles.ja: パワハラ限界勇者、魔王軍から好待遇でスカウトされる～勇者ランキング１位なのに手取りがゴミ過ぎて生活できません～

description.en:
In this modern age, there are many heroes and demon lords. There was a hero who ranked first in the hero rankings and had the title of "Strongest''. His name is Hero Allen. The strongest hero, who is recognized by everyone, has gained status and honor, and his life is in easy mode...

"That never happened!"

Orders to subjugate the Demon King are issued without a break. Even if you go to great lengths to subjugate a brutal demon lord, you will only receive an amount that even an average man can easily earn, excluding miscellaneous expenses. All expeditions are at my own expense. It's not very bad, but I can't live with it. He then confronts the demon king of destiny. The beautiful female demon lord made a proposal to the dissatisfied hero.

"Hero! Get hired on these conditions!"

The conditions were so favorable, that I was moved.
description.ja:
無数の勇者と魔王が存在する世界で、『最強』の称号を持つ勇者アレン。だが彼は、悩んでいた…
・絶え間ない魔王討伐命令
・王様からのパワハラ
・見合わない報酬

もう、我慢の限界!!

そんな金欠勇者に魔王から救いの手が!? 超好待遇のスカウトにアレンの選択は――

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

altTitles.ja: ムジナにの深い

description.en: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?
description.es: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?
description.ja: この世界に、私は”必要”かーー！？何気ない日常の中、刀を背に空を翔ぶ「ムジナ」と呼ばれる者の実体とは…？人間とは、社会とは、人権とは、そして幸せとは…
description.ru: История о юной девушке-убийце с катаной, которая охотится за своими целями в оживлённом столичном городе Цукумо.
description.es-la: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?

altTitles.ja: 魔物の城

altTitles.en: Castle of Demons

description.en:
"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

altTitles.en: MARRIAGETOXIN

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.fr:
Gero est l'aîné d'un clan de tueurs à gages spécialisé dans les poisons. Criminel de naissance, malgré son bon fond, il a grandi en marge de la société et s'imagine n'avoir aucune chance de trouver l'amour. Jusqu'au jour où son clan lui lance un ultimatum : s'il ne se marie pas pour donner naissance à un héritier, ils forceront sa petite sœur à le faire !

Or, sa prochaine cible est une arnaqueuse, spécialisée dans les mariages arrangés... Acculé, Gero la supplie alors de l'aider.
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.ja: 堀さんと宮村くん
堀桑与宫村君

altTitles.en: Hori-san and Miyamura-kun Webcomic

description.en:
The original story which the popular manga series Horimiya is based on.  
  
It's said that youth is bittersweet, but maybe it's just bitter? Kyoko Hori is a flashy high school girl, who, despite her ostentatious appearance, excels in academics and loves her family. Izumi Miyamura is a bland high school boy, who, regardless of not wanting to stand out in class, secretly wears piercings outside of school and has a large body tattoo. One day, Miyamura finds Hori's little brother injured and helps him back to Hori's house, where the relationship between Hori and Miyamura begins with Hori's discovery of Miyamura's secret, and his of her's.  
  


---
description.ru:
В школе Хори-сан – пример для всех – красивая, дружелюбная девушка с высокой успеваемостью, но это лишь одна её сторона, другую – она тщательно скрывает. Её родителей-трудоголиков часто не бывает дома, так что Хори вынуждена всё своё свободное время посвящать домашним делам и присмотру за младшим братом.  
Миямура-кун кажется одноклассникам мрачным отаку в очках, однако на самом деле он очень вежливый и спокойный человек, и ему трудно даётся учёба. Миямура не любит выделяться, так что усердно скрывает, что у него есть пирсинг и татуировки.  
Однажды случай сводит их вместе за пределами школы. Хори едва узнаёт в нём своего одноклассника, а Миямура поражён тем, насколько она отличается от того образа, что поддерживает в школе. Теперь им двоим есть с кем поделиться своими тайнами и раскрыть настоящих себя.  
  


---

Chapters 1 - 140 are the main story.  
Chapters 141 onwards are extras.

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

Yuka, 28 years old and without a boyfriend, decides to participate in the group date. 
But what she meets there is a math teacher she had a crush on in high school...! The two become drinking buddies and meet more and more often, until one day they get drunk and end up spending the night at a hotel.  *"Ten years have passed, and I've grown up... but I'm liking him more and more... is it because I'm his former student? Or...?"*

description.id: Setelah dipindahkan ke dunia lain dengan semua teman sekelasnya, Yoshitsune diperintahkan untuk menaklukkan dungeon sebagai pahlawan.  Sementara rekan-rekannya semua tertarik dan dijinakkan oleh tawaran seks tanpa batas dengan para pelayan kastil, Yoshitsune, seorang pahlawan berpangkat rendah, mengabdikan keterampilan curangnya untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak istri pelayan ...

description.pt-br: Depois de ser transportado para outro mundo com todos os seus colegas de classe, Yoshitsune foi ordenado a conquistar a masmorra como um herói.  Enquanto seus colegas eram todos atraídos e domados pela oferta de sexo ilimitado com as empregadas do castelo, Yoshitsune, um herói de baixo escalão, dedicou suas habilidades de trapaça para conseguir mais e mais empregadas domésticas...

altTitles.ja: デビルマンレディー

description.en:
Fudou Jun is a highschool teacher and takes a trip with a group of students. While there, a group of martial artists staying nearby take a strange interest in the girls.  
These men are actually demons and after changing into their true form break into the cabin to rape the girls. One gets Jun and violates her.  
She feels her soul being torn apart and transforms into Devilman Lady. With newfound powers and strength she kills all the demons and protects the girls from any further harm.  
What are these demons and why did she turn into a hybrid of one? What does this mean for her and for the rest of humanity?
description.pt-br: Fudou Jun é uma professora do colegial que fez uma viagem com um grupo de estudantes. Enquanto estava lá, um grupo de lutadores que estavam nas proximidades desenvolvem um estranho interesse pelas meninas. Esses homens são na verdade demônios e depois de mudar para sua forma verdadeira, eles entram na pousada para estuprar as meninas. Um deles pega Jun para violá-la. Ela sente sua alma dilacerada e se transforma em Devilman Lady. Com poderes e força recém descobertos, ela mata todos os demônios e protege as meninas de qualquer outro dano. O que são esses demônios e por que ela se transformou em um híbrido? O que isso significa para ela e para o resto da humanidade?

title.en: UsoNatsu ~The Summer Romance Bloomed From A Lie~

altTitles.ja: 嘘から始まる恋の夏 -squall-

altTitles.ja-ro: Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu -squall-

altTitles.es-la: Un verano de amor que comienza con una mentira -squall-

description.en:
Kaoru, who had run away from home, is found and protected by her main teacher, Mirei, in the rain. At school, the teacher seemed like a responsible adult, but at home, her attitude is careless, drinking alcohol during the day and making jokes with a smile on her face. However, she accepts and understands the worries that Kaoru could not cope with.... Thus begins the faltering romance of two people who cannot yet become adults.

An official manga adapting the visual novel "Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu" that was not shown in the main story, focusing on the relationship between a teacher and her student, portraying a love story, Youth ✕ Summer ✕ Yuri.
description.es-la:
Kaoru, quien había huido de casa, es encontrada y protegida por su profesora principal, Mirei, bajo la lluvia. En la escuela, la profesora parecía una adulta responsable, pero en casa, su actitud es descuidada, bebe alcohol durante el día y hace bromas con una sonrisa en el rostro. Sin embargo, acepta y comprende las preocupaciones con las que Kaoru no podía enfrentarse... Así comienza el titubeante romance de dos personas que aún no pueden convertirse en adultas.

Un manga oficial que adapta la novela visual "Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu" que no se mostró en la historia principal, centrándose en la relación entre una profesora y su alumna, retratando una historia de amor, Juventud ✕ Verano ✕ Yuri.

altTitles.ja: ダブルヘリクス ブロッサム

description.en: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.
description.ja:
2人の少女が織りなすSFバディアクション

警察官である19歳の少女・東雲菊は、とある事件を捜査している最中、大けがを負ってしまう。現代の医療では治療不可能とされた彼女に残された唯一の道は、長き眠りにつく「コールドスリープ」であった・・・。次に彼女の意識が戻ったのは、60年後の日本――！

そこで犯罪を取り締まっているのは、彼女が所属していたかつての警察ではなく、民間の警察組織だった。そうした中、重犯罪者・月下香とバディを組むことに…。長き眠りから覚めた菊と、超能力を使う香。

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

description.en: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

altTitles.en: Daily Chaldea

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: The Snow Leopard Baby of the Black Leopard Family

description.en: A child, born a hybrid and abused to death by their grandfather, is reborn with memories of their past life. Faced with the same fate, they seek out their estranged father for protection until adulthood. Expecting rejection, they are instead met with love and acceptance from their father, siblings, and grandfather—who even offers them the family leadership.

description.en: Sharks don't have lungs, but they do have to breathe oxygen to survive. Instead of breathing air, though, sharks get oxygen from the water that surrounds them. So they have to move around, if they stop moving for a while, they sink into the water and die, So Sharks have to move and move constantly from birth to death. The same goes for you. If you want to survive, keep moving, then you will be the best hunter… like a shark.
